alert.note: Alert for Baldwin (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 22 at 11:56PM CDT until March 23 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN BALDWIN COUNTY... At 1156 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles west of Daphne to near Dauphin Island, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Daphne, Fairhope, Point Clear and Fort Morgan. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CDT for southwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
